Translations.Name: ASolarSailsDesc
Translations.ZHCN: 我们在${PlanetName}的轨道附近发现了一艘被遗弃的太阳帆飞船。这艘亚光速飞船的主人来自未知文明，并且似乎有数千年的历史了。其中一面帆有一个大裂口，似乎是被物体穿过留下的——很可能是一颗流星——这或许是飞船失去飞行能力的原因。虽然这艘飞船的科技已经很大程度上落伍了，但一些工学设计还是非常有趣的。
Translations.ENUS: We found an abandoned solar sail spacecraft near the orbit of ${PlanetName}. The owner of this sublight ship is from an unknown civilization and appears to be thousands of years old. One of the sails has a large rip that appears to have been left by an object passing through it - most likely a meteor - which may be the reason for the ship's loss of flight capability. Although the ship's technology is largely outdated, some of the engineering design is still very interesting.
